titleInfo.title: The weak capacity of averaged channels

mods.abstract: Coding theorem and weak converse of the coding theorem are proved for averaged semicontinuous stationary channels and for almost periodic discrete channels, whose phases are statistically known. Explicit formulas for the capacities are given. The strong converses of the coding theorems do not hold.

originInfo.publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
